Detailed Description

Definition at line 637 of file lpc17xx_emac.h.

Field Documentation

uint32_t Mode

Supported EMAC PHY device speed, should be one of the following:

  • EMAC_MODE_AUTO
  • EMAC_MODE_10M_FULL
  • EMAC_MODE_10M_HALF
  • EMAC_MODE_100M_FULL
  • EMAC_MODE_100M_HALF

Definition at line 638 of file lpc17xx_emac.h.

uint8_t* pbEMAC_Addr

Pointer to EMAC Station address that contains 6-bytes of MAC address, it must be sorted in order (bEMAC_Addr[0]..[5])

Definition at line 645 of file lpc17xx_emac.h.
